textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply   Reply with quote   Good stuff and a great image!, thanks for the input. I often shoot with the 50 1.2 and I find it to be close to perfect on my 6D. When I used the original 5D I seldom used the center point because of focus shift but the 6D seems to work well with the lens. I do not even think about the focus point except for
